body.name: Sensyne 74" Camera Tripod, Heavy Duty Tripod for Camera with Wireless Remote and Travel Bag, Compatible with DSLR Camera, Cellphone, Projector, Webcam, Ring Light, Spotting Scopes

features: Unleash Your Creativity: The Heavy-duty camera tripod extends from 18.8in to 74in, ideal for DSLR Cameras, Cell Phones, Projectors, Webcams, and Ring Lights. Perfect for Photography, Live Streaming, Video Recording, and Vlogging. Sturdy and stable for professional-quality results. Capture stunning moments with ease.

Capture with Versatility: This tripod for camera features a versatile central mechanism, allowing quick adjustments to various shooting angles. Effortlessly switch between Landscape Mode, Portrait Mode, Low Angle Shots, High Angle Shots, and more. Unlock new perspectives and unleash your creativity in seconds.

Phone-Friendly TripodPro: Elevate Your Mobile Photography! Compact tripod with universal 360° rotating phone holder (2.2" to 5.5" width). Wireless remote for selfies/group photos (10m range), compatible with iOS, Android, HONGMENG, etc. Capture stunning moments with ease!

Solid Support: Our camera tripod boasts a sturdy aluminum-alloy structure, ensuring stability for cellphones, cameras, and devices up to 5KG. Crafted with high-grade materials (Aluminum Alloy and ABS Resin), it offers reliable support for various shots smoothly.

Customer-Centric Support: We've Got You Covered! Contact us for any issues like incomplete parcels, defects, or damages. Enjoy a 12-month warranty and lifelong professional customer service. Reach out to our dedicated team for prompt assistance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A game changer for photography
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Title: A Game-Changer for Mobile Photography: The Sensyne 7.4 Inch Camera Tripod StandReview:I recently had the opportunity to try out the Sensyne 7.4 Inch Camera Tripod Stand, and I must say, it has completely transformed my mobile photography experience! This versatile and compact tripod stand is an absolute game-changer for anyone looking to capture incredible shots with their smartphone.First and foremost, the build quality of the Sensyne tripod stand is impressive. It feels sturdy and well-made, ensuring that your smartphone is securely held in place while shooting. The adjustable legs provide stability on any surface, whether it's a rocky terrain or a smooth tabletop. It also comes with a handy phone holder that firmly grips your device, giving you peace of mind knowing that your precious smartphone is safe.Setting up the tripod stand is a breeze. With its intuitive design, it took me only a couple of seconds to extend the legs and adjust the height to my desired level. It provides a stable and reliable base for shooting both photos and videos, eliminating any shaky footage and allowing you to focus on your creative vision.Another impressive feature of this tripod stand is its versatility. It comes with a 360-degree rotatable ball head, which allows for effortless angle adjustments. Whether you want to capture breathtaking landscapes, record vlogs, or take group selfies, the Sensyne tripod stand has got you covered.Overall, I am thoroughly impressed with the Sensyne 7.4 Inch Camera Tripod Stand. It's a must-have accessory for any mobile /camera photography enthusiast. Its sturdy build, compact size, and versatility make it an excellent investment. Whether you're a professional photographer or simply enjoy capturing memorable moments with your smartphone, this tripod stand will undoubtedly elevate your photography game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Bastion of Stability and Versatility
reviews.reviewText: In an age where capturing and projecting visuals is vital for both professional and personal endeavors, a robust and dependable tripod stand is indispensable. The Sensyne 74" Camera Tripod Stand unequivocally rises to this occasion, excelling not only in feature-richness but notably in its exceptional build quality and sturdiness.Robust Build Quality - A Masterclass in EngineeringThe cornerstone of this tripod's excellence lies in its heavy-duty construction. Fabricated with premium materials that promise enduring resilience, it strikes the perfect balance between rigidity and portability. The structural integrity ensures that whether it's a DSLR camera, a projector, or any other compatible device, the tripod stand offers unwavering support, eliminating concerns about potential mishaps or device falls.Versatility Meets StabilityThe tripod offers universal compatibility, extending its usability to a diverse range of devices like DSLR cameras, cellphones, projectors, webcams, ring lights, and spotting scopes. Despite its multi-faceted functionality, stability remains uncompromised, reinforcing the product's value proposition significantly.Extendable Phone Holder for Enhanced UsabilityThe extendable phone holder is a standout feature that amplifies the tripod's convenience factor. The holder's adjustability accommodates multiple phone sizes, and its solid construction minimizes any risk of slippage or device damage, further testament to the product's focus on secure utility.Easy Setup and TransportWhile its build is unquestionably robust, the tripod has been designed with user-friendliness in mind. The setup process is straightforward and intuitive, allowing for rapid deployment when time is of the essence. Its design also accounts for easy transport, making it a practical choice for field work.Final ThoughtsIn summation, the Sensyne 74" Camera Tripod Stand distinguishes itself as a paragon of robust construction and multifunctional utility. Its superior build quality ensures that it stands as a rock-solid foundation for a plethora of devices, instilling confidence in the user. It effectively shatters the notion that versatility comes at the cost of stability, delivering on both fronts in an extraordinary manner. This product unreservedly earns a five-star rating and is unequivocally recommended for anyone who values both quality construction and expansive compatibility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this as an addition to my photographic gigs, however it works for phones too. When use with phone, it has a Bluetooth remote to take pictures which connects effortlessly with phone. It is sturdy and stable when a camera is mounted on it. It can switch to between different landscape with no issue enhancing easy photo taking. It is not heavy so it is portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Sensyne 74" Camera Tripod Stand, and I couldn't be more thrilled with my purchase! This tripod is a game-changer for anyone who loves photography, videography, or even just making video calls with a webcam.The build quality is top-notch. It's incredibly sturdy and feels like it can handle heavy-duty cameras and equipment with ease. Setting it up is a breeze, and the extendable phone holder is a fantastic addition. I love that it's compatible with various devices like DSLR cameras, cellphones, projectors, webcams, ring lights, and spotting scopes. It truly is a versatile tool.The tripod's adjustable legs and quick-release plate make it convenient to get the perfect angle and switch between devices seamlessly. The fact that it can accommodate different equipment types means I don't need multiple tripods for different tasks.Overall, the Sensyne 74" Camera Tripod Stand is a must-have for any content creator, photographer, or anyone who needs a reliable and versatile tripod. I can confidently give it a 5-star rating for its build quality, ease of use, and the endless creative possibilities it offers.
